item.title: Ins and Outs of the Coworking Course Launch
item.description: It took a while, but the coworking community course has finally been launched. I kept my timing and the email announcing it went out last Thursday. Doing a text only course was a good choice. It is much easier to work and rework the content and I can make the delivery much faster. The students have to put their time into doing the tasks to improve their own coworking space community, not on trying to understand my accent in a video.
